news_title: Ripple Powers Europe’s Core Banking Through TAS Network Gateway
news_subtitle: Ripple’s integration with the TAS Network Gateway embeds it in Europe’s core banking rails, unlocking access to TARGET2, SEPA and T2/T2S.
